name: Dark Changes: Lugubrious Heartrending V0.0.90
description:
Dark Changes: Lugubrious Heartrending V0.0.90

Your family has disappeared and maybe you will be the next.  You are trapped in a world where depends on the hour. (Note: Only at 2pm you can play a level)
